qa.name: Mr. Buttons
qa.appearance: Well-worn brown fur with a red bowtie

tr.name: Captain Whiskers
tr.appearance: Sleek black fur with white paws

xc.name: The Dustbunny King
xc.appearance: Amorphous cloud of dust with glowing eyes

json_to_edit.voice_over: In the shadows of a child's room, a forgotten toy awakens to a world unseen.
json_to_edit.description: Mr. Buttons, a well-loved teddy bear, leads a secret double life between Lily's room and the hidden world under her bed.
json_to_edit.lighting: Soft nightlight glow and magical under-bed bioluminescence
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Soft breathing, distant traffic, magical twinkles
json_to_edit.name: The Secret Life of Mr. Buttons
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Mr. Buttons transitions between Lily's room and the magical under-bed world, interacting with various characters in both realms.

qa.action: Lily's bedroom at night, with Mr. Buttons sitting forgotten on a shelf.

hf.action: Mr. Buttons' eyes suddenly come to life, glancing around the room.

tr.action: Mr. Buttons climbs down from the shelf and disappears under Lily's bed.

xc.action: The magical under-bed world is revealed, full of forgotten toys and dust bunnies.

ka.action: Mr. Buttons greets Captain Whiskers, who's lounging on a dust cloud.

fn.action: The Dustbunny King emerges from the shadows, eyes glowing ominously.

af.action: Morning light streams into Lily's room as she wakes, finding Mr. Buttons back on the shelf.

edit_command: Remove every third shot from the scene, but don't change anything else.

label.rationale: we will remove every third shot from the scene as requested, while keeping all other elements unchanged. this means we'll remove shots "tr" and "ka" from the original list of 7 shots, reducing the total number of shots to 5. we'll update the "number_of_shots" field accordingly and adjust the "list_display_order" in the "shots" section. the content of the remaining shots and all other scene details will remain the same.
